name: Bellator
description:
Embody a powerful gladiator in this 3D Brawler and become the champion of the arena, the Bellator!

Fight in an evolutive arena that changes through the waves of enemies.

Use up to three types of weapons you'll find in the arena or left by the enemies you've defeated to continue your slaughter and win the favor of the crowd to unlock powerful abilities. But beware, your weapon will break if you use it too much, so be sure to find one quickly!

Additional information:

The game was made remotely during a lockdown as a student project for Isart Digital. The team was composed of 3 game designers and 2 game programmers.

What I've contributed to:

  • Game Design
  • Level Design
  • Sound Design
  •  Art
  • Balancing

Using a XBOX controller is highly recommended. Have fun!
